<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemist Goggles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3431)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 310 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 605 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses. While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) alchemical items. When making [Strikes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with alchemical bombs, you ignore lesser [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=2372) . If your Strike with an alchemical bomb fails (but doesn't critically fail), you gain a +1 item bonus to the splash damage the target of the Strike takes.

</column>
